comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Oh sure, you guys think it's funny; zipping around the county with this guy on your wheel. It felt like Pee Wee's Big Adventure. Matt and Linda and I tried to lose him, more for the sake of keeping up a "professional" image than anything else. But the harder we worked the more it became apparent we were stuck with him. It was like a bad dream. The Curse of the Velcro Cruiser. Nightmare on Folsom Street. In fact, I think he might be behind me at this very moment! Aaaarghh!!
